mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.user_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.article_id, c.created_at, c.is_deleted, u.nickname FROM comments c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.article_id = #{articleId} AND c.parent_comment_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC;
